title: CS Competency Practical Skill Enhancement: Graphic Organizer Utilization Strategies in Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can improve cognitive engagement levels by over 30% using graphic organizers in online discussions.
Learners can generate two or more discussion topics considering alternative perspectives during collaborative learning.

Learners can analyze differences in discussion strategies among three types of graphic organizers (concept maps, flowcharts, comparison tables) during project-based tasks and write a report identifying at least two strategic differences per type.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
